TEXT.TITLE: U.S. FACILITIES <USRE> SEMI-ANNUAL DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Semi-annual dividend 4 cts Pay May 29 Record April 14 Note: full name is U.S. Facilities Corp. This is first dividend declared since company completed its initial public offering on November 7. Reuter
